refnamediv.refpurpose: Extracts a key from user's repository

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The function returns a string containing base64 encoded binary key data. It is used to extract symmetric or asymmetric keys. So if key is asymmetric (RSA or DSA) the second parameter designate which part to extract private or public.

refsect2.title: public
refsect2.para: 1 - export public part, 0 - export private key if exists.

refsect1.title: Return Types
refsect1.para: The function returns serialized key material.

example.title: Exporting a RSA public key.
example.para: The 'ServerPrivate.pfx' is a own RSA key so we exporting public part to supply to some party to encrypt data for us.
